name: Dark Matter
description: Discover this fantastic remake of the classic arcade game Asteroids!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 Процессор: 1 GHz Оперативная память: 256 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX DirectX: Версии 9.0c Место на диске: 250 MB Звуковая карта: Windows DirectSound compatible sound card Дополнительно: Mouse, Keyboard

reviews.review_text: 6.1/10 - Funish Space Shooter  This is a pretty good arcade space shooter. Controls are a little annoying when it comes to navigation but overall not bad. I can't say this is better or worse than Asteroid or the 3,532 other space shooters, but it's decent enough.  Campaign has 30+ missions where the difficulty ranges greatly. I personally wouldn't pay $5 since they didn't really innovate or expand the genre.  Worth $1     Accidently Reviewed
Prty good for free, my friend gave it to me when he bought 10 random keys on ♥♥♥... Thnks Dom!
